Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Elena Scherbakova, director of the Russian State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company, and her husband on the threshold of the New Year 2005.
 The gift was conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Moscow by the director.

Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to Mozambican President
    Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Armando Emilio Guebuza upon his election as president of the Republic of Mozambique.
 The message expressed the belief that the excellent friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably in the future, too, wishing him great success in his responsible work for the national unity and prosperity of the country.
